title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), insofar as those provisions relate to
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (commencement) order 2022

title: (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), insofar as those provisions relate to
heading: 2. The 31st day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which 
section 5(2) of and Schedule 2 to the National Treasury Management Agency 
(Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), insofar as those provisions relate to 
the amendment specified in item 1(a) of Part 3 of that Schedule, shall come 
into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 December, 2022. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [695] 3
